author: Business Insider
description:
Whether it's local bakeries or big chocolatiers, there seems to be a version of "Dubai chocolate" just about everywhere. So how did this dessert become a viral sensation and how are businesses around the world cashing in on the trend?

00:00 – Introduction
00:58 – Fix Dessert Chocolatiers
02:20 – Replicating the Bar
03:04 – Bolci Chocolate Factory in Turkey
06:20 – Where the Cocoa Comes From
06:57 – Making Kataifi at Kontos Foods
09:22 – The Peppertux Farms Pistachio Cream
10:08 – How Pistachios Are Grown and Processed
13:19 – Shake Shack Joins the Trend
14:33 – Dubai Chocolate in Famous Bakeries
16:44 – Influencers Take on the Trend
18:45 – Keeping Up With Holiday Demand
20:09 – Pop-Ups for Original Dubai Chocolate Bar
21:08 – End Credits

title: Why Dubai Chocolate Triggered A Global Food Obsession
